wikipedia_page.main: Air Commodore Gordon Moulds, CBE DL is a retired Senior Royal Air Force Officer who held various commands including most recently Commander of Kandahar Airfield in Afghanistan.

response: * Gordon Moulds – Air Commodore who previously held a senior post in the Falkland Islands

He served as the head of the Officer and Aircrew Cadet Training Unit at RAF Cranwell from 2006 until May 2008. In May 2008, he became Commandant Air Cadets, replacing Air Commodore Gordon Moulds. After two years as Commandant, Stewart handed over the baton of command to Air Commodore Barbara Cooper in May 2010.Air Cadets: Barbara takes command of Air Cadets. Retrieved 18 January 2011
* Air Commodore Gordon Moulds, former Commander of Kandahar Airfield, Afghanistan

The small staff base enables it to remain efficient while growing service coverage. The current CEO of KidsOut is, Gordon Moulds, who was appointed Director of Fundraising in December 2011, moving to the post of Chief Executive from July 2012. The charity is governed by a board of 18 Trustees and is also supported by 18 Ambassadors and 2 Patrons, John Parrott and John Peters.
